Reference.Description: Linux kernel - challenge ack information leak

Vulnerability.Title: Linux kernel - challenge ack information leak

cvrf:Note.#text: net/ipv4/tcp_input.c in certain Linux kernel versions does not properly determine the rate of challenge ACK segments, which makes it easier for remote attackers to hijack TCP sessions via a blind in-window attack.
For FortiOS, upgrade to versions5.2.9 or5.4.2 or5.6.0 or5.4.2 orupcoming 5.6.0
